error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the eufy-security-ws add-on. Make sure the add-on is installed and running.

data_description.host: The IP address or hostname of the eufy-security-ws add-on. Use `127.0.0.1` if running as a Home Assistant add-on.
data_description.port: The port number of the eufy-security-ws add-on (default: 3000).

user.description: Connect to the eufy-security-ws add-on to access your Eufy Security cameras. You must install the [eufy-security-ws add-on](https://github.com/bropat/hassio-eufy-security-ws) first.
user.title: Connect to eufy-security-ws

cannot_connect.message: Unable to connect to eufy-security-ws add-on
